overview: Jeremy and Elliot seem to be on good terms with one another, but a pill pop seems to unlock far-reaching nightmares in Elliot, partly due to a mysterious painting, ‘Somnium‘, which Jeremy claims inspired the artist from a dream he had. However, even Jeremy is finding the surroundings, which includes items and the location about to be auctioned off, causing him to have sexual urges that could impact on both their lives.
title: Somnium
